name: @akiojin/setup-xocde-environment-github-action
description: GitHub Actions to configure provisioning and other settings required when signing at build time

scripts.build: npm install && ncc build src/main.ts -o dist --license licenses.txt
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean --force

author: Akio Jinsenji <akio-jinsenji@cloud-creative-studios.com> (https://github.com/akiojin)
